# Grading

This test is graded by assessing the patient's symptoms

- Negative test: Same/increased symptoms
- Positive test: Reduced symptoms @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - Indicative of some form of foraminal compression @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - [Z-joint irritation]({{< var ref-z-joint-irritation.path >}}) @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
